attributes.action: Only the public should be able to decide on a PM, if only to protect democracy
attributes.additional_details:
•The EU referendum
•David Cameron stepping down
•Boris Johnson could become Prime minister. 
•Democracy
attributes.background: The EU referendum has saw the stepping down of a PM and after a democratic vote it would be so very undemocratic to have an unelected Prime minister which the public may not agree to.
